name: Digital Diamond Web Media
tag_list: vancouver-web-development, vancouver-website-design, website-design-vancouver, web-development-vancouver, vancouver-web-marketing, web-marketing-vancouver, vancouver-internet-marketing, internet-marketing-vancouver
overview:
Vancouver website design, web development, hosting and web marketing service provider helping Vancouver businesses with website design, ecommerce development, search engine optimization, SEO, SEM, social media marketing since 1999.

Our Vancouver website design team helps local businesses make the most of the internet by taking advantage of HTML, JavaScript & CSS technologies. Have our web designers develop an engaging, effective and successful website for your business!

For more sophisticated needs, several past projects involved custom web application development, custom ecommerce & shopping cart development, CMS, CRM development using MySQL databases, PHP & XML programming, inventory systems, financial planning systems, HRMS & job board application development and more.

Once your website’s complete, our Vancouver web marketing comes into play ranging from on-site and off-site optimization, link building, social media, articles, email marketing, SEO, SEM, blog marketing, social networking and more.
